name: INFESTATION (itch)
description:
The web build might have some performance issues, desktop version looks better.

Controls:

  • W - forward
  • S - back
  • A - left
  • D - right
  • SPACE - jump
  • E - melee attack
  • Q - ranged attack

A GDL - july jam entry. This is my second jam and i had a lot of fun making this small freaky game.

At first there was supposed to be a big boss at the end, however i did not think i had the time to make ( also im lazy ;) ).

Also i discovered that web builds dont like bloom and emmisive materials because it decited to either just not render them or make stuff using them x10 times bigger. (might be a problem with my project and not Unity)

Discord: Beelzeboss#1087
